scripts.client-compile-js-bundle: browserify src/client/index.js -t stringify --extensions [.html] --debug | exorcist statics/lib/js/index.js.map > statics/lib/js/index.js
scripts.client-compile-js-uglify: uglifyjs statics/lib/js/index.js -o statics/lib/js/index.js --source-map statics/lib/js/index.js.map -p relative --in-source-map statics/lib/js/index.js.map
scripts.client-compile-js: npm run client-compile-js-bundle && npm run client-compile-js-uglify
scripts.client-compile: npm run client-compile-css && npm run client-compile-js
scripts.watch-client-tests: watch 'npm run client-tests' src/client/ tests/client/ mockups/client --interval 2
scripts.watch-client-coverage: watch 'npm run client-coverage' src/client/ tests/client/ mockups/client --interval 10
scripts.watch-server-tests: watch 'npm run server-tests' src/server/ tests/server/ mockups/server --interval 2
scripts.watch-server-coverage: watch 'npm run server-coverage' src/server/ tests/server/ mockups/server --interval 10
